update schedule
schedule_name = #{scheduleName},
schedule_like = #{scheduleLike},
schedule_view = #{scheduleView},
schedule_owner = #{scheduleOwner},
schedule_public = #{schedulePublic},
schedule_state = #{scheduleState},
schedule_start_date = #{scheduleStartDate},
schedule_end_date = #{scheduleEndDate},
schedule_etime = systimestamp
where schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}
mapper.select: select attachment_no from schedule_profile where schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}

SELECT S.schedule_no, S.schedule_name, CASE WHEN SYSDATE < S.schedule_start_date THEN '약속전' WHEN SYSDATE > S.schedule_end_date THEN '종료' ELSE '진행중' END AS scheduleState, S.schedule_public, S.schedule_start_date, S.schedule_end_date, S.schedule_owner, SP.attachment_no as scheduleImage, (SELECT count(*) FROM schedule_member M WHERE M.schedule_no = S.schedule_no) as memberCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM schedule_unit U WHERE U.schedule_no = S.schedule_no) as unitCount, U.schedule_unit_content as unitFirst, T.tags FROM schedule S
JOIN schedule_member SM ON S.schedule_no = SM.schedule_no
LEFT JOIN schedule_profile SP ON S.schedule_no = SP.schedule_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT schedule_no, schedule_unit_content FROM ( SELECT schedule_no, schedule_unit_content, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY schedule_no ORDER BY schedule_unit_no ASC) as rn FROM schedule_unit ) WHERE rn = 1 ) U ON S.schedule_no = U.schedule_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT schedule_no, LISTAGG(tag_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY tag_name) as tags FROM schedule_tag GROUP BY schedule_no ) T ON S.schedule_no = T.schedule_no
AND SM.account_id = #{accountId}
AND S.schedule_public = 'Y'
AND S.schedule_end_date < SYSDATE
ORDER BY S.schedule_no DESC
select * from schedule where schedule_public = 'Y' order by schedule_no desc
select * from schedule order by schedule_no desc
